books.title: The Transformation of Philip Jettan
books.author: Georgette Heyer
books.summary: In eighteenth-century England, a handsome youth reluctantly transforms himself into a fashionable gentleman in order to win the heart of the girl he loves.

books.title: I Will Repay
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A young woman pursues revenge against the man who killed her brother in a duel years before.

books.title: Personal Memoirs of Ulysses S. Grant
books.author: Ulysses S. Grant
books.summary: One of the greatest generals of the United States tells the story of his life and details his key role in winning the Civil War.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: Just So Stories
books.author: Rudyard Kipling
books.summary: A collection of short humorous fables for children, most purporting to tell the origin of animal characteristics such as the camel’s hump.

books.title: Mike
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A boy’s adventures in public school are filled with cricket, colorful characters, and a great deal of fun at the expense of authoritarian school masters.

books.title: Three Sisters
books.author: Anton Chekhov
books.summary: Three sisters long to escape their provincial town and return to Moscow.

books.title: Harding’s Luck
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: A poor orphan boy accidentally discovers magic which sends him into the past and leads to his recovery of a fortune and a lordly title.

books.title: The Financier
books.author: Theodore Dreiser
books.summary: A young man makes and loses a fortune in Civil War era America.

books.title: The Private Memoirs and Confessions of a Justified Sinner
books.author: James Hogg
books.summary: A religious fanatic’s mysterious friend helps turn him into a killer.

books.title: The Hashish Eater
books.author: Fitz Hugh Ludlow
books.summary: A philosophical contemplation of youthful adventures spent ingesting large doses of psychoactive cannabis extract.

books.title: Clouds of Witness
books.author: Dorothy L. Sayers
books.summary: An aristocrat with a passion for detective work has to clear the Duke, his brother, from a charge of murder.

books.title: Representative Men
books.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
books.summary: A collection of seven lectures by Ralph Waldo Emerson on great men and their role in society.

books.title: Walden
books.author: Henry David Thoreau
books.summary: Thoreau’s report on his social experiment of solitude, simplicity, and self-reliance.

books.title: How to Tell the Birds from the Flowers and Other Woodcuts
books.author: Robert Williams Wood
books.summary: A physicist writes and illustrates a collection of humorous poems responding to the Nature Fakers controversy.

books.title: Dodsworth
books.author: Sinclair Lewis
books.summary: A newly-retired businessman’s peaceful European trip falls apart as his wife chases high European society.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: H. Beam Piper
books.summary: A collection of science fiction stories by H. Beam Piper ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Frank Belknap Long
books.summary: A collection of short fiction by Frank Belknap Long, ordered by date of original publication.

books.title: A Day at a Time
books.author: Archibald Alexander
books.summary: A 1916 Christian devotional reflecting on faith and morality during World War I.

books.title: Roughing It
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Mark Twain’s semiautobiographical account of his travel across the United States.
